item.title: 永明人寿大力招聘，加强资产部实力
item.description: 永明金融公司（Sun Life Financial Inc. ）新近统一的资产管理部门计划招聘约 20 名高级管理人员，以将投资经理的集合转变为一个更加协调的全球力量。【原文：Sun Life Financial Inc.’s newly unified asset-management division plans to hire about 20 senior executives as it looks to turn a collection of investment managers into a more coordinated global powerhouse.】

item.title: 美联储古尔斯比表示对 "前置式 "降息感到不安
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，他对在 12 月份的央行会议上再次降息仍心存疑虑。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee signaled that he’s still apprehensive about delivering another rate cut at the central bank’s December meeting.】

item.title: 德意志银行就 Finra 冲突索赔案达成 250 万美元和解
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）将支付 250 万美元，以解决行业监管机构指控其未能在债务和股票研究报告中适当披露利益冲突的问题。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG will pay $2.5 million to resolve an industry regulator’s allegations that it failed to properly disclose conflicts of interest in debt and equity research reports.】

item.title: Perplexity 在移动平台上推出人工智能浏览器，扩展与谷歌的竞争关系
item.description: Perplexity AI公司推出了移动设备版Comet网络浏览器，将与谷歌的竞争延伸到了谷歌的安卓操作系统上。【原文：Perplexity AI unveiled a version of its Comet web browser for mobile devices, extending a rivalry with Google to the search giant’s Android operating system.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利推迟数据中心债务出售，阿里巴巴面临风险
item.description: 以摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）为首的银行推迟了一个关键的最后期限，以便给投资者更多的时间来评估 ServerFarm 公司 5.89 亿美元的数据中心债券，因为这些债券与中国科技巨头阿里巴巴集团（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. ）的关系引起了投资者的担忧。【原文：Banks led by Morgan Stanley pushed back a key deadline to give investors more time to evaluate $589 million of ServerFarm data center bonds after concerns flared up over their ties to Chinese technology giant Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.】

item.title: 私人信贷公司将以债换股的方式解决 48Forty 公司的债务问题
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在为支持 Summit Partners 收购托盘公司 48Forty Solutions 提供 17.5 亿美元债务约一年后，私人信用贷款机构准备控制该公司。【原文：Private credit lenders are poised to take control of pallet company 48Forty Solutions, about a year after providing $1.75 billion of debt to support Summit Partners’ acquisition of the business, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 总部位于密苏里州的中央银行首次公开募股后股价上涨 7
item.description: 中央银行公司（Central Bancompany Inc.【原文：Central Bancompany Inc., a holding company for a regional lender, jumped 7% in its trading debut after it raised $373.4 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 大学运动员的薪资引发高等院校债券买家的担忧
item.description: 美国大学的体育预算正成为购买高等教育市政债务的投资者关注的另一个问题，在允许顶尖体育院校向学生运动员支付工资的和解协议获得批准约五个月后，美国大学的体育预算正成为购买高等教育市政债务的投资者关注的另一个问题。【原文：US universities’ athletic budgets are becoming another source of concern for investors who buy higher-education municipal debt, about five months after the approval of a settlement that allowed top sports colleges to pay their student-athletes.】

item.title: 意大利足球俱乐部尤文图斯通过出售股份寻求新的资金来源
item.description: 意大利尤文图斯足球俱乐部（Juventus Football Club SpA）已开始出售股票，以补充现金。【原文：Italy’s Juventus Football Club SpA has kicked off a stock sale in a bid to top up cash.】

item.title: 人工智能聊天机器人向寻求流产逆转的用户提供有害提示
item.description: 据一份新的报告称，流行的人工智能聊天机器人经常把寻求堕胎逆转建议的用户引向一条热线，而这条热线推广的是一种未经证实且有潜在危险的治疗方法。【原文：Popular AI chatbots are routinely steering users who ask for advice on reversing an abortion to a hotline that promotes an unproven and potentially dangerous treatment, according to a new report.】

item.title: 巴西中央银行多年来一直被警告存在 Banco Master 风险
item.description: 巴西最高金融监管机构多年来一直被警告，本周因欺诈指控而被清算的 Banco Master SA 正在以惊人的速度扩张，同时持有不透明的资产。【原文：Brazil’s top financial regulator was warned for years that Banco Master SA, which was liquidated this week amid allegations of fraud, was expanding at an alarming pace while holding opaque assets.】

item.title: 据称 EQT 接近达成 20 亿欧元从 Blackstone 收购 Desotec 的交易
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，EQT AB 接近达成一项交易，从 Blackstone Inc.【原文：EQT AB is nearing a deal to acquire a majority stake in European environmental service company Desotec from Blackstone Inc., four years after it sold the business to the US private equity firm, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 机器人初创公司 Physical Intelligence 获得 56 亿美元新融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，开发人工智能软件以帮助机器人学习各种任务的初创公司 Physical Intelligence 在新一轮融资中筹集了 6 亿美元，公司估值达 56 亿美元。【原文：Physical Intelligence, a startup developing artificial intelligence software to help robots learn a wide range of tasks, has raised $600 million in a new round of funding that values the company at $5.6 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.Alphabet Inc.’s independent growth fund CapitalG led the round, with participation from existing investors Lux Capital, Thrive Capital and Amazon.com Inc. founder Jeff Bezos, said the people, who asked not to be identified discussing priva】

item.title: 2025 年，仅两个行业就占美国就业增长的 100
item.description: 如果您正在寻找医疗保健或酒店业的工作，好消息是美国公司正在招聘。但其他经济领域的雇主正在缩减规模。【原文：If you’re looking for a job in health care or hospitality, the good news is US companies are hiring. But employers across the rest of the economy are scaling back.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第三周攀升，达到 6.26
item.description: 抵押贷款利率连续第三周攀升，进一步挤压了购房者的负担能力。【原文：Mortgage rates climbed for a third week, further squeezing affordability for homebuyers.】

item.title: 墨西哥增长乏力导致物价降温，贸易不确定性也是影响因素之一
item.description: 根据墨西哥中央银行最近一次利率决议的会议记录，大多数董事会成员表示，墨西哥疲软的经济将有助于缓解未来几个月的通胀压力。【原文：Mexico’s sluggish economy will help ease inflationary pressures in the upcoming months, according to the minutes of the central bank’s latest rate decision citing most board members.】

item.title: 印度信实公司停止在部分重要炼油厂使用俄罗斯石油
item.description: 印度信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Limited）表示，由于美国的制裁迫使该公司回避与莫斯科的交易，它将停止在其巨型贾姆纳加尔炼油厂的一部分加工俄罗斯石油。【原文：India’s Reliance Industries Limited said it would stop processing Russian oil at part of its giant Jamnagar oil refinery as US sanctions force the company to shy away from dealings with Moscow.】

item.title: 为福特皮卡车供货的铝厂再次发生火灾
item.description: 铝供应商诺维利斯公司（Novelis Inc.【原文：Aluminum supplier Novelis Inc. said its employees were safely evacuated after another fire broke out at its facility in New York on Thursday.】

item.description:
英伟达的财报平息了人们对人工智能泡沫的担忧，但它尚未走出困境。在今天的 "Big Take "播客中，我们将探讨该公司在追赶全球需求时面临的挑战。【原文：

item.title: 埃及在通胀意外上升后维持利率不变
item.description: 埃及维持利率不变，在通胀率五个月来首次意外加快后选择谨慎行事。【原文：Egypt left interest rates unchanged, opting for caution after inflation unexpectedly quickened for the first time in five months.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油公司建议派发 2020 年以来最低中期股息
item.description: 由于原油价格下滑、卢布走强和美国制裁迫在眉睫，俄罗斯石油巨头俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）计划在 2020 年支付自大流行病以来最低的中期股息。【原文：Russian oil giant Rosneft PJSC plans to pay the lowest interim dividends since the pandemic in 2020 as slumping crude prices, a stronger ruble and looming US sanctions bite.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会废除拜登时代旨在应对盐台风的网络规则
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会投票决定撤销拜登时代的网络安全法规，这些法规旨在解决去年影响主要电信运营商的大规模网络入侵（被称为 "盐台风"）问题。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission voted to roll back Biden-era cybersecurity regulations designed to address the massive network intrusion known as Salt Typhoon that affected major telecommunications carriers last year.】

item.title: Citadel 的鲁布纳认为 S&P 500 指数在 "健康 "回调后将反弹至 7,000 点
item.description: Citadel 证券公司的斯科特-鲁伯纳（Scott Rubner）认为，近期 S&P 500 指数的 "健康 "回调为强劲反弹奠定了基础，市场定位和季节性趋势有望推动反弹至年底。【原文：A recent “healthy” pullback in the S&P 500 Index has set the stage for a powerful rebound, according to Citadel Securities’ Scott Rubner, with market positioning and seasonal trends poised to fuel a rally into year-end.】

item.title: 南非央行行长称人工智能泡沫给新兴市场带来风险
item.description: 南非央行行长莱塞特贾-克加亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，人工智能股票的繁荣正在带来泡沫风险，可能威胁新兴市场。【原文：The boom in artificial intelligence stocks is creating a risk of a bubble, which could threaten emerging markets, South Africa’s central bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago said.】

item.title: Bath & Body Works 的债券风险因零售商下调前景而上升
item.description: 周四，保护 Bath & Body Works 公司债务免于违约的成本跃升至七个月高点，此前该零售商下调了财年展望，并宣布了一项扭亏为盈计划，重新专注于其核心产品。【原文：The cost of protecting Bath & Body Works Inc.’s debt against default jumped to a seven-month high on Thursday, after the retailer cut its fiscal-year outlook and announced a turnaround plan to refocus on its core offerings.】

item.title: 雅培签订 2025 年最大一笔过桥贷款，为收购提供资金支持
item.description: 雅培实验室（Abbott Laboratories）从摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）获得了今年最大的一笔高评级过桥贷款（200 亿美元），为其收购 Exact Sciences 公司提供资金。【原文：Abbott Laboratories has teed up the largest high-grade bridge loan this year — a $20 billion facility from Morgan Stanley — to fund its acquisition of Exact Sciences Corp.】

item.title: 保罗-都铎-琼斯支持的 Numerai 获得 5 亿美元估值
item.description: 亿万富翁保罗-都铎-琼斯（Paul Tudor Jones）支持的一家众包对冲基金从大学捐赠基金和风险投资公司筹集了新资金，估值达 5 亿美元，因为其非常规选股模式的表现优于同行。【原文：A crowdsourcing hedge fund backed by billionaire Paul Tudor Jones has raised fresh capital from university endowments and venture firms at a valuation of $500 million, after its unconventional stock-picking model outperformed peers.】

item.title: 美联储库克密切关注私人信贷和资产估值
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）表示，由于杠杆公司的 "复杂性和相互关联性增加"，官员们应监测私人信贷中的意外损失可能如何扩散到更广泛的美国金融体系。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said officials should monitor how unexpected losses in private credit may spread to the broader US financial system due to the “increased complexity and the interconnections” with leveraged firms.】

item.title: 巴格达接管销售权，卢克石油公司的伊拉克石油源源不断
item.description: 卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）在伊拉克所占油田的石油正源源不断地流向全球市场，缓解了人们对俄罗斯能源巨头受到制裁后供应中断的担忧。【原文：Oil from Lukoil PJSC’s share of a field in Iraq is continuing to flow to global markets, alleviating concerns about supply disruption in the wake of sanctions on the Russian energy giant.】

Some 920 exchange-traded funds have launched in the US this year alone. On Trillions, we attempt to pick the most notable among them.
